entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Emerson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
